survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding plant-based dairy alternatives, including purchase frequency, preferred brands, and factors influencing their choices.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives (e.g., almond milk, oat milk, soy yogurt)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure options are clear and cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives (e.g., almond milk, oat milk, soy yogurt)?

questions.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you typically consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Several times a week', 'Once a week', or 'A few times a month' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option to capture additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.
